name: info-nedongtire-com

scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:vue
scripts.build:static: echo "Building static version..." && npm run copy:static
scripts.copy:static: mkdir dist\static 2>nul || echo.>nul && copy contact.html dist\static\ >nul && copy contact-data-browser.js dist\static\ >nul && copy serve.json dist\static\ >nul && copy index.js dist\static\ >nul && copy index.d.ts dist\static\ >nul && copy _redirects dist\static\ >nul && copy netlify.toml dist\static\ >nul && copy tencent-cloud-pages.json dist\static\ >nul && copy edgeone.json dist\static\ >nul && echo "Static build completed in dist/static/"

author: Guangzhou Nedong Information Technology Co., Ltd.
